name: workout-cool
description: workout-cool is a self-hosted workout planner and tracker focused on simplicity. Users can define routines, record sessions, and review history via an accessible web UI suitable on desktop and mobile.

features.title: Routine Builder
features.description: Create workout routines with exercises, sets, reps, and rest periods for structured training

features.title: Session Logging
features.description: Record completed workouts with actual weights, reps, and notes for each exercise

features.title: Exercise Database
features.description: Access a library of common exercises with instructions and muscle group targeting

features.title: Progress Charts
features.description: Visualize strength gains and workout frequency over time with simple graphs

features.title: Workout History
features.description: Browse past sessions to review what you did and track consistency

features.title: Rest Timer
features.description: Built-in countdown timer to manage rest intervals between sets during workouts

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Use the app on smartphones during gym sessions with a touch-friendly interface

features.title: Quick Start
features.description: Begin workouts quickly by selecting from saved routines or recent sessions
